author: AsapSCIENCE
description:
Ketamine has been rising in popularity now for years. The biochemistry and science of the drug is fascinating - leading to doctors, therapists and the general public using it more often. It potentially cures depression - while also being extremely dangerous. So what is going on with Ketamine, and why is everyone doing it now?

Created by: Mitchell Moffit and Gregory Brown
Written by: Gregory Brown
Edited by: Luka Sarlija
Drawn by: Gregory Brown

title: Why ketamine is suddenly so popular
